casebody.data:
Turnip Investments, LLC, Plaintiff
v.
Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, Subsidiary of Deutsche Trust Corporation, f/k/a Bankers Trust Company, individually and as trustee for RAMP 2004-SL4; GMAC Mortgage, LLC; Grady I. Ingle, Substitute Trustee; and Elizabeth B. Ells, Substitute Trustee, Defendants No. COA16-246 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 6, 2016

DISMISSED.
